question: If the bark and phloem tissue of a woody shoot are peeled off by ringing, the whole plant will eventually die because
optionA: water does not reach the leaves
optionB: water and salts remained below the ring portion
optionC: there is a withdrawal of water from the root by soil
optionD: manufactured food does not reach the roots
answer: manufactured food does not reach the roots
